About.vue.name: About
About.vue.description: LiftUp, founded in 2025, is a digital mental health platform offering anonymous, community-powered support. It features NueraAI, a 24/7 chatbot with evidence-based tools, and AI-powered therapist matching. Learn about our mission, team, and values.

team.name: Reymel Mislang
team.description: Founder of LiftUp and creator of the platform’s core systems. Focused on accessible, tech-driven mental health tools that empower users worldwide.

Forum.vue.name: Forum
Forum.vue.description: A safe, anonymous community for sharing mental health experiences. Create posts, comment, and sort by newest or most popular with pagination.

SelfCare.vue.name: SelfCare
SelfCare.vue.description: Curated self-care resources for mental, physical, and emotional wellness. Filter by type or time, sort by relevance, and view in grid or list format.

Profile.vue.name: Profile
Profile.vue.description: View and edit user info, including bio, posts, and saved resources. Includes mock session data; account deletion and photo changes are non-functional.

Home.vue.name: Home
Home.vue.description: Introduces LiftUp’s community, 24/7 NueraAI chatbot, and expert resources like articles, videos, and tools for anxiety, depression, and mindfulness.

Resources.vue.name: Resources
Resources.vue.description: Expert-curated mental health resources, filterable by category or type. Sort by relevance or rating and view in grid or list format.

EmergencyResources.vue.name: EmergencyResources
EmergencyResources.vue.description: Immediate support via NueraAI, therapist finder, 24/7 crisis hotlines (e.g., 988 Lifeline), and local resources for urgent needs.
